definition: to bear/to give birth/to grow/to rear/to bring up (children)/fertility
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: China is implementing a family planning policy. So I'm the only child in my family.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在實施計劃生育政策，所以我是家中的獨生子。

sentences.english: Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
sentences.chinese: 優育是我國計劃生育政策的一個重要內容。

sentences.english: Family planning in Xiaotun village is deemed a success.
sentences.chinese: 小屯村被認爲是計劃生育的成功典型。

sentences.english: Deordorizer distillates are one of main materials for tocopherol.
sentences.chinese: 油脂脫臭餾出物是生產天然生育酚的好原料。

sentences.english: This means the change had procreated .
Maternal diabetes increases the risk of fetal macrosomia and shoulder dystocia.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病孕婦生育巨大胎兒及發生肩難產的危險性增加。

sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通過添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的穩定性很強。

sentences.english: Radiotherapy and chemotherapy can damage the fertility and ovarian function heavily.
sentences.chinese: 放化療嚴重損害患者的卵巢功能和生育能力。

sentences.english: Compared with other social insurances, maternity insurance has evident sexual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 與其他社會保險相比，生育保險具有明顯的性別特徵。

sentences.english: What should I avoid to protect female fertility?
sentences.chinese: 我該避免些什麼，以保護生育能力？

sentences.english: Mr. Ho has at least 17 acknowledged children from the four women he and others call his wives.
sentences.chinese: 何鴻燊的四房太太爲他至少生育了17個兒女。

sentences.english: The realm of reproductive technology is unusually laissez-faire in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 在美國對待輔助生育技術的濫用持放任自流的態度。

sentences.english: Are interested in simple and time-effective birth control.
sentences.chinese: 有興趣的簡單和時間有效控制生育。

sentences.english: He settles the barren woman in her home as a happy mother of children.
sentences.chinese: 他使不能生育的婦人安居家中，爲多子的樂母。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti fertility function of Andrographis Paniculata.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究穿心蓮的抗生育作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Depending on ability of adjusting the period of reproduction they can make adaptation successfully.
sentences.chinese: 結論依靠主動調整生育期長短的能力順利完成生活史。

definition: to become pregnant/to carry a child in the womb
to give birth to a child or children
to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
late childbirth/to have a child at a later age
